verses.verse: to the end <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G4531>be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5030>quickly<s%> <S%G4531>shaken<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> your <S%G3563>mind<s%>, <S%G3383>nor<s%> yet be <S%G2360>troubled<s%>, <S%G3383>either<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, <S%G3383>or<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G3383>or<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1992>epistle<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1223>from<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G5547>Lord<s%> is just at <S%G1764>hand<s%>;

let <S%G1818><s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1818>beguile<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G3367>any<s%> <S%G5158>wise<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> it will not <S%G1437>be<s%>, except the falling <S%G646>away<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> be <S%G601>revealed<s%>, the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G3361>perdition<s%>,

he that <S%G480>opposeth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> exalteth <S%G5229>himself<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> that is <S%G4574>worshipped<s%>; so <S%G5620>that<s%> he846, 5613, 2316 <S%G2523>sitteth<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G584>setting<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3754>forth<s%> <S%G2076>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Remember <S%G3421><s%> ye <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%>, when I <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, I <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%> that which <S%G2722>restraineth<s%>, to the end <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> may be <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> own <S%G2540>season<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G458>lawlessness<s%> <S%G1754>doth<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G1754>work<s%>: <S%G3440>only<s%> there is <S%G2722>one<s%> that <S%G2722>restraineth<s%> <S%G737>now<s%>, <S%G2193>until<s%> he be <S%G1096>taken<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3319>way<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G601>shall<s%> be <S%G601>revealed<s%> the <S%G459>lawless<s%> <S%G3739>one<s%>, whom the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> Jesus shall <S%G355>slay<s%> with the <S%G4151>breath<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> bring to <S%G2673>nought<s%> by the <S%G2015>manifestation<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G539>deceit<s%> of <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> <S%G1722>for<s%> them that <S%G622>perish<s%>; <S%G473>because<s%> they <S%G1209>received<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%>, <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> might be <S%G3739>saved<s%>.

that <S%G2443><s%> <S%G2919>they<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> might be <S%G2919>judged<s%> who <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> had <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> are <S%G3784>bound<s%> to give <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G25>beloved<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, for <S%G3754>that<s%> God2316, 138 <S%G138>chose<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G38>sanctification<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4102>belief<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%>:

whereunto <S%G1519><s%> he <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%>, <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4047>obtaining<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

So <S%G3767>then<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, stand <S%G4739>fast<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2902>hold<s%> the <S%G3862>traditions<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> ye were <S%G1321>taught<s%>, <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> by <S%G1992>epistle<s%> of <S%G2257>ours<s%>.
